Author: damnitjanet6
Text: As an ex-exercise purger I feel you. I used to exercise like mad to burn off all my binges but now I’ve got ME and I can’t exercise like I used to, so since I got diagnosed I’ve heaped on the weight because I just can’t stop binging and can’t purge so it just goes straight to my bloated tummy. Now I’m falling back into restriction, I can’t have anything good unless I don’t have anything else.   I’m sorry you’re in this situation ♥️ perhaps it’s a sign you should be a bit kinder to yourself

Author: absolute_boy
Text: It just makes me so upset because I high restrict every day and most days the only time I get to feel full and eat something delicious is during a planned binge/purge session, but now since I can't purge I don't even have that to look forward to. I guess it's the restriction-only life for me from now on.
